text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yoo, Biko. Why'd you call me out here
all the sudden?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Hishiama! Don't you feel like 
becoming a super hero!?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Huh? What are you on about?

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Courage! Kindness! Passion! I think you
deserve to be in a Hero Team!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hahah. I know you want to be a hero.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
But that's nothing for someone like me
toâ€”

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Aaah!? Hishiama! 
There's an evil organization 
attacking horsegirls over there!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Say what!? Not on my watch! 
Turn yourselves over, scoundrels!

text_block_list.name: Biko Pegasus
text_block_list.text:
Oooooh! Those words! 
You're like a real superhero, Hishiama!
